Title: Armaf Club De Nuit Intense Man Eau de Toilette Spray 105ml
Product overview:
Explore your wild side with Club De Nuit Intense Man, a sophisticated masculine fragrance that is designed to captivate and tantalise. This bold scent is a perfect balance of citrus, wood and spice that will have you ready to take on the night.

Start with a fresh burst of lemon, bergamot, pineapple, apple and blackcurrant that will tantalise your senses and awaken your spirit. Then, a distinctive heart of birch, rose and jasmine will linger on your skin, creating an unforgettable signature. Finally, this intoxicating blend of ambergris, musk, vanilla and patchouli will leave a lasting impression that will have you coming back for more.

This unique, yet classic combination of notes is perfect for any man looking to make a statement. Whether you're hitting the town for a night out or just want something that will turn heads, Club De Nuit Intense Man is the perfect scent for you. So, add a little intrigue to your life and try this timeless fragrance today.

Club De Nuit Intense Man is the perfect way to take your look to the next level and make a statement. With its bold and sophisticated aroma, you'll be ready for anything the night brings. So, don't wait - add this fragrance to your basket today and be ready for anything.

Notes: Lemon, Bergamot, Pineapple, Apple, Blackcurrant, Birch, Rose, Jasmine, Ambergris, Musk, Vanilla, Patchouli.

Title: Nautica Voyage Eau de Toilette Spray 100ml
Product overview: Nautica Voyage is a fresh and salty sea breeze, that carries romantic scents of coastal herbs and woods and awakes the man's instinct to measure his power with wild nature. This is a fragrance for an active and romantic man who lives by his own rules. The composition opens with cold, green notes of leaves and apples. There is a tender dewy mimose in the heart, which is blended with a watery note of lotus and an interesting accord of linen sail of a yacht. The composition is laid on a woody base, a combination of cedar, moss, musk and amber. The nose behind the perfume is Maurice Roucel. The fragrance was launched in 2006.

Title: Calvin Klein CK One Eau de Toilette 200ml
Product overview:
CK One embodies a universal spirit for a diverse world. It is an iconic fragrance that is unapologetically bold, yet exudes youthful, fresh simplicity. Celebrating individuality and unity, this fragrance evokes the excitement of limitless opportunity.

Bringing together refreshing notes of green tea, papaya, and bergamot. Perfectly balanced with soft accents of nutmeg, violet, cardamom, and rose. Compelling and dynamic, CK One is a dialogue between the masculine and feminine.

CK One is revolutionary, rejecting traditional gender stereotypes and harmonizing feminine floral and masculine musk into one unisex scent, appealing to men and women alike.

This fragrance carries fresh notes of green tea while embracing the sweetness of amber and musk.

Top notes: Green Tea, Bergamot, Cardamom
Heart notes: Violet, Rose, Nutmeg
Base notes: Amber, Musk

Please note: We are unable to ship fragrances over 150ml outside of the UK.

The woody notes give Calvin Klein Obsession Night for Men an amber feel.

The scent moves seamlessly into a warm spicy heart of nutmeg, cinnamon, pink pepper and cardamom. BOSS In Motion then finishes with masculine base notes of sandalwood, vetiver and musk fragrances.

This classic men’s scent is an ode to an active lifestyle and is a must-have fragrance for any Hugo BOSS fan.

Title: Calvin Klein Man Eau de Toilette 100ml
Product overview:
Man Eau de Toilette captures the essence of the modern Calvin Klein man. Bursting with crisp freshness, exotic spices, and rich woods. Sexy and stylish, it embodies the simplicity of contemporary luxury and style.

A fragrance built on rich, earthy notes. Exotic cypress wood, guaiac wood, and amberwood set the tone. Bay, nutmeg, and incense layer the scent, culminating with top notes of rosemary, mandarin, and violet leaf. Fresh and bright, yet complex and deep. Minimalism with meaning.

A fragrance for modern men who appreciate the rich, happy simplicity of a minimalist lifestyle. The ease of ""less is more,"" where the purity of single ingredients carries the intended message. A scent that celebrates introspection, for men who know exactly what they want.

Fragrance Family: Woody
Top Notes: Rosemary, mandarin, bergamot, violet leaf
Heart Notes: Bay leaves, nutmeg, incense, spearmint
Base Notes: Cypress wood, guaiac wood, amberwood, musk

Title: Perfumer's Choice No. 10 Mojo Eau de Parfum Spray 83ml

Title: Moschino Uomo? Eau de Toilette Spray 125ml
Product overview:
UOMO? That's the question! A fresh and fragrant scent to reawaken the sense of smell of modern man who's increasingly perplexed in a society that questions roles and genres, that prefers a nice guy attitude to a tough guy stance, that favours the brain builder over the body-builder. Through the question mark of UOMO?, Moschino's men's fragrance exemplifies a cultural doubt that crosses, like a sceptical shiver, through the entire concept of virility in traditional men's perfumes. UOMO? comes in a bottle resembling a whisky flask that deliberately evokes an almost cinematographic citation of masculinity.

Fresh and sparkling top notes of coriander grains, kumquat, new hedione and rosewood give way to a heart of cyclamen, cinnamon leaves and clary sage. Base notes of cedarwood, artemisia, sunlight accord, amber wood and musk round out this intriguing Aromatic/Floral/Musk fragrance.Moschino Uomo is a musky fragrance of cedar wood and fruit.

Title: Armani Acqua Di Giò Parfum 75ml

The powerful fragrance is distinguished by its incense notes, which bring an incandescent intensity to the emblematic marine notes of Acqua di Giò. The result is a charismatic, vibrant fragrance with an aura of mystery, that is representative of a rugged landscape meeting the ocean's strength and immensity.

Davidoff, for the first time has revisited Cool Water's freshness with an ethically sourced ingredient: the green mandarin. This handpicked citrus was harvested by a community in the Vale Do Caí in Brazil, as part of a sustainable sourcing partnership monitored by the perfume creator.

The fragrance opens with top notes of lime and caviar, then blends into a heart of chilled vodka and frozen mint. 212 VIP men finishes with a smooth base of leather and woody accords.

Venezuelan-born Carolina Herrera was a late starter in the fashion industry, launching her luxury clothing company when she was 40 years old in 1980. She was known as one of the best-dressed women in the world during this era and later famously styled former First Lady Jackie Kennedy.

Title: Versace Eros Eau de Parfum Spray 200ml
Product overview:
Created by perfumer Olivier Pescheux, Eros Parfum expresses sensuality and power, an extreme force that represents a heroic and passionate man, much like Eros, the Greek god whose arrow can make you fall in love.

A fragrance with an element of charm that brings love, passion and seduction splendidly to the fore, Eros Parfum embodies excess and provocation. It has a signature that is not afraid to flaunt itself and reveal its extremes, with a stark contrast between the extremely citrusy and the extremely delicate.

Radiant and energetic top notes of Italian lemon and mandarin are entwined with spicy elemi, black pepper, and a unique twist of litsea cubeba. The heart gives way to a herbal trove of Pomarose, Geranium, Lavender, and Sage. Finally, a base of smooth benzoin, patchouli, and vanilla round out this Woody Amber Fresh parfum.

Top notes: Lemon, Mandarin, Litsea Cubeba, Elemi, Black Pepper
Heart notes: Pomarose, Geranium Oil, Lavender, Sage Oil
Base notes: Benzoin Resinoid, Patchouli and Vanilla

Title: Cerruti 1881 Pour Homme Eau de Toilette Spray 50ml
Product overview:
Nino Cerruti 1881 Pour Homme eau de toilette spray for men is a light, fruity fragrance, opening with top notes of rose, berry, spices, lavender and lemon, flowing into a heart of blackberry extract, gingko and clove, atop a smooth base of sandalwood, musk and saffron.

Here at Fragrance Direct our customers love Nino Cerruti and their wonderful collection of fragrances and toiletries, and this Nino Cerruti 1881 Pour Homme eau de toilette spray for men is a big hit for its fresh, masculine scent that is ideal for casual wear.

Born in Italy in 1930, Nino Cerruti became head of the family textiles business after his fathers untimely death in the 50s. Using his experience of producing top quality fabrics, Nino decided to branch out into the clothing market. Nino Cerruti also produces a range of men's and women's fragrances, many of which incorporate the number 1881 into the title; the year in which Nino's grandfather established the family textile mill in Italy.

Title: Yves Saint Laurent M7 Eau de Toilette Spray 80ml
Product overview:
Yves Saint Laurent M7 eau de toilette natural spray for men is a warm and intense fragrance, opening with top notes of mandarin, which then blends with a heart of patchouli, all of which is rounded off with a base of oud wood, cistus and myrrh.

Here at Fragrance Direct we have an outstanding selection of fragrances and toiletries on offer, and our customers are big fans of this Yves Saint Laurent M7 eau de toilette natural spray for men for its raw and sensual aroma that is ideal for the desirable and dangerous man.

Yves Saint Laurent was born in the former French Algeria region in 1936, and moved to Paris at the age of 17, being hired as assistant to Christian Dior. Laurent was appointed head of the House of Dior after his death, then launched his own fashion label in 1961, and quickly forged a reputation as one of the most influential fashion designers in the world. The YSL product collection here at Fragrance Direct includes a whole host of fragrances and toiletries for both men and women.

Title: Britney Spears Prerogative Eau de Parfum Spray 30ml

Explore yourself and be who you want to be. Walk into a world where there’s room for your PREROGATIVE - where you’re free to live for your moment. Follow your instinct.

The fragrance composition is unusual and exotic. The scent opens with pink pepper, goji berries and apricot. The heart of the composition reveals a special accord of red calla lily, latex petals and espresso foam which are spiced up with soft saffron cream. The base is subtle, woody and warm, composed of sandalwood and amberwood.

Title: Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum Eau de Parfum Spray 50ml
Product overview:
The show must go on! Making his triumphant entrance to the cheers of the crowd, this boxing legend is back. Jean Paul Gaultier Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum makes a champion of bravado simply oozing sex appeal. A new Eau de Parfum intense with an even sexier and more outrageous punch. Check out the theatrical case and black lacquered torso. Ready to knock you out with the first spray of this woody amber fragrance. A high-voltage performance right up to his victory.

A scandalously intense Eau de Parfum with warm woody notes.

Woody amber Eau de Parfum Intense by Quentin Bisch, Nathalie Cetto and Christophe Raynaud.

Scandal? This sexy boxer takes her by surprise. Knock ‘em for six with sweet geranium. Punch hard with an uppercut of delicious tonka bean. Finish with sensual sandalwood. His tactic always works! One little spray and it’s a knock-out. Overwhelmed by addictive woody amber notes. What a performance!

Ingredients: Alcohol Denat.0, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Coumarin, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Citral, Cinnamal, Geraniol, Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 42090 (Blue 1).

A Citrus Woody, this popular Eau de Toilette opens with the invigorating and energizing freshness of Lemon and Mandarin contrasted with the herbaceous spicy freshness of Coriander. Finally the base notes create a long lasting strength and elegance with the warmth of amber, the intensity of Leather and the woody Cedar notes

Edgy and cool, the question is are you brave enough?
